    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Checklist_Create_Item_Adapter 

    public class Checklist_Item_ArrayAdapter
extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Checklist_Item_Row>
    Provides the mapping between the checklist_item_row.xml and checklist_item_row objects.
    Version:
    1.0v Build * March 18 2015
    Author:
    David Krawchuk
